latestVersion.versionNote:
These are the data and codes to reproduce the results in Table 1-5 of the article.

8/1/12: revised by editorial office

fields.value: Replication data for: The Effect of Immigration on Productivity: Evidence From U.S. States

publicationCitation.value: Peri, Giovanni, (2012) "The Effect of Immigration on Productivity: Evidence From U.S. States." The Review of Economics and Statistics 94:1, pages 348-358.

files.description: This annotated stata constructs the variables A and Phi and produces the results of regressions in Table 1 and 2 of the paper for those dependent variables
files.label: Tables_A_beta_phi.do

dataFile.description: This annotated stata constructs the variables A and Phi and produces the results of regressions in Table 1 and 2 of the paper for those dependent variables

files.description: This annotated Stata file constructs the variables A and beta and runs the regressions of tables 3 and 4 and 5 using those as dependent variables.
files.label: Tables_controls_A_beta.do

dataFile.description: This annotated Stata file constructs the variables A and beta and runs the regressions of tables 3 and 4 and 5 using those as dependent variables.

files.description: This annotated stata file constructs the variables hours worked, employment and h and runs the regressions relative to those for Table 1,2 and 5.
files.label: Tables_empl_hours_h.do

dataFile.description: This annotated stata file constructs the variables hours worked, employment and h and runs the regressions relative to those for Table 1,2 and 5.
